sub_title: Artist, Arti-tect, Advisor in public art&culture, landscape and placemaking using the language of imagination.
summary:
Art and Place Making in Public Space, Creative Coaching, Organising Cultural Events, Project Development and Consultancy.
Projects range from the design of Artworks in Public Space, turning 'space into place' and the gentle art of Place Making.
Rotterdam, Nijmegen, Ruhrarea, Nantes, Krasnoyarsk, New York, Berlin, Groningen, Maasvlakte, Hamburg, Heemskerk, Terschelling and many more - big and small - places in the world have our interest and are cities and sites where we are happy to work for.

Specialties: Connecting seperated worlds of Architecture, Urban Planning, Arts&Culture and Daily life.

And sometimes it is better to let somebody else speak for you:
Ruud is trained as a visual artist, and member of the artist collective Observatorium. His work concentrates on the performance of public spaces. The transitions in the build environment are always a phenomenon of underlying social and economic processes. The impact and value of these processes for communities and everyday life is never determined. The ability to broaden the perspective and bring new perceptions to what seems to be a status quo is the essence of his work. The work has a broad scope, ranging from landscapes in the former industrial zones of the Ruhrgebiet, to placemaking activities in the City of Rotterdam. He combines action and research, in changing coalitions, always connecting the perspective of art with politics and urban development.
- Arie Lengkeek

treasury_media.title: EMSCHERKUNST: Eine Nachlese zum Projekt „Warten auf den Fluss"
treasury_media.description: Menschen neugierig machen und miteinander ins Gespräch bringen: Eine hölzerne Brückenskulptur mit dem Titel „Warten auf den Fluss" steht in einer Brachlandschaft an der Emscher und berührt jene, die sie besitzen und besetzen. Warten kann intensiver erlebt werden als Nichtstun - und ein scheinbar „sinnloses" Objekt, nämlich eine Brücke über einen Fluss, der noch nicht da ist, kann Menschen zu einem neuen Landschaftserleben bringen.

treasury_media.title: HALDENSAGA - Halde Norddeutschland in Neukirchen Vluyn
treasury_media.description: Eine Produktion für die RUHR.2010. Wir haben acht "Haldenportraits" produziert die auf der Seite http://www.haldensaga.de den Menschen zeigen soll wie schön und abwechslungsreich doch die Berge des Ruhrgebiets so sind.

treasury_media.title: Zandwacht (English subtitles)
treasury_media.description: Wie onlangs het maasvlaktestrand heeft bezocht, kan het bijna niet ontgaan zijn: het indrukwekkende kunstwerk de Zandwacht. Met een oppervlakte van 20 bij 40 meter en een hoogte van 12 meter is het een beeldbepalend object. De Zandwacht verbeeldt hoe duinen worden gevormd. Het is ontwikkeld door het Rotterdamse, internationaal werkzame kunstenaarscollectief Observatorium.

authors.headline: Artist, Arti-tect, Advisor in public art&culture, landscape and placemaking using the language of imagination.
Visual artist/author of public art – founder/partner OBSERVATORIUM.ORG

profile_positions.description:
2019
Frontrunner Sustainibility for Mooi, Mooier, Middelland. My local community is challenging itself to become the green, greener, greenest neighbourhood of Rotterdam. Climate adaption and Energy transition being realised through the language of Imagintation and through CDC - Community Driven Change. 

2018
Consultant for the town of Lansingerland. A 'new town' of 70.000 people that, after years of building, is looking for a cultural identity. A combination of landscape, heritage and public art under the titel EXPO LANSINGERLAND

2017
Aalst (Belgium), Sense of Place (Friesland), Leuvehaven en Oostplein (Rotterdam), Alblasserdam and the other so-called Drechtsteden are all 'spaces looking for places'. 

2016
Artistic advisor for RiverArt
http://www.oeverproject.nl

Stoepmakers Oostplein
http://stoepmakersoostplein.nl

www.kleinpolderpleinpark.nl
https://www.facebook.com/kleinpolderpleinpark/?fref=ts

2015
Zandwacht is open for the public from June 2015 at the Maasvlakte II. Probably the highlight of 2015 as it comes to sculpture in public space.




More Observatorium projects:
www.lippepolderpark.de
www.oeverproject.nl
www.nomanslandproject.net

2014
Fly-over A9 Heemskerk. Stad-Rand-Rand-Stad Gate. A bicycle bridge over the highway with two viewing points on the highway. Google Images: fly over A9 Heemskerk



Groot Museumpark. A temporary project for Het Nieuwe Instituut about the future of the Rotterdam Museumpark. www.grootmuseumpark.nl

Waiting for the River 2014
In the summer of 2014 the work will be installed in Dordrecht commissioned by the municipality of Dordrecht in collaboration with Stadswerven and Dordtyard. For one and a half year it will host artist-in- residence, research projects on the RIjnmond-Drechtsteden Delta issues and much more. 
Google images: warten auf den Fluss
